review.review_reply: Hey, Andrei!  Thanks for the kind words and for the great 5-star rating!

review.comment: Started using West Tech this summer after a minor breakdown. Their customer service is excellent, and the turn around time in the shop is quick. I would highly recommend them to anyone.
review.review_reply: Hey, Mark!  Thank you for recommending us to others and for this 5-star review!

review.comment: This is a small shop but they have alot of techs and 3 service trucks so they can handle quite a bit of work. The front staff are very knowledgeable and straightforward
review.review_reply: Thanks for the review, Jeff 👍

review.comment: Had a no start condition after accidently causing a short throuh the OBDII plug. Metered the start circuits and all tests proved good and pointed to the PCM as having the fault. I was thinking I either needed a new PCM or a Ford VMCII to fix the problem. I contacted the ownerof West tech Mobile to have him send a technician to my location as the truck was dead or it would require a tow to take anywhere to have it looked at. We talked for a couple minutes and he provided me with a couple things to check. The first idea he had I did not think of previously and sure enough the problem was evident immediately. Two electrical error codes present. Cleared the codes and the truck started.  I called him back to thank him for the save on a tow or call out for a technician. I then asked him on some advise about products that are best practice to protect a Diesel engine and he helped me once again. Best  advice I have received for protection of my Diesel engine. I would take my rig to WTM any day and if I can't drive to them I will have them come to me. Thank you WTM.
review.review_reply: Hey, Don!  Our team is always ready to help whether it is at our shop, on the road, or sometimes just over the phone.  Thanks for the review!
Hey, Riley!  Thank you for the 5-star review 😊

review.comment: I saw West tech had good reviews. I just got in town and had an air leak. I checked in in the morning and they addressed my issue immediately. Great people at this shop. Rare find. I will return again. Glad to give them my business.
review.review_reply: Hey, Richard!  Thanks for the compliments and 5-star review!  We're always happy to help out!  Have a nice rest of your day!
Thank you for the 5-star rating, Doug!

review.comment: Having dealt with all the guys at West Tech over a number of years for service on company fleet trucks I've come to look forward to service times. Genuine, understanding , and empathetic to the budget needs of their customers Tony and the guys have always gone out of their way to help me. Give ya six stars if I could guys, thanks!
review.review_reply: Glad to be able to help you out for so many years!  Thanks for choosing us and our team and thanks for leaving this awesome review 👍

review.comment: Nothing but good things to say about these guys! Brought my samurai in, everyone very knowledgeable and friendly, most important though, they were honest!
review.review_reply: Honesty is KEY!  Thanks for coming to our team and thanks so much for leaving a 5-star review!  Have a nice day, Jonathan!

review.comment: I warmly recommend West Tech Mobile, great service and a TON of technical expertise. Best attitude, work quality, quick turnover and unbeatable prices!
review.review_reply: Hey, Hardy!  Thanks for the kind words and for taking the time to leave this 5-star review!  Have a great long weekend!

review.comment: Good folks.
review.review_reply: Thanks for the 5-Star review, Keith!  Have a great night!

review.comment: Friendly place and got my truck fixed!
review.review_reply: Hey, Eric!  Thank you for the nice review :)

review.comment: I have been using Westech for over a year now for most of my maintenance, repair and CVI work. With a car carrier it is difficult to find a shop that can do all the jobs ( welding, structure, suspension etc) but these guys do it all.Timely repairs, work with me to keep me moving and fit me in when I need an emergency fix ( like I did on friday ) Their service trucks are well rigged out and the staff is dedicated to get the job done 'RIGHT' and Bill and Tony make sure- if you not happy, they not happy.
review.review_reply: Hey, Ron!  We understand you have high standards when it comes to who you allow to work on your equipment.  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to do this work and we really appreciate your great review!
Hey, Cory!  Thank you for the 5-Star Google review :)  Have a nice day!

review.comment: We have been using WTM for our fleet for over 10 years. Always had excellent service. Definitely recommend for heavy truck repair and maintenance.
review.review_reply: Hey, Trevor!  We're so happy to have been bringing you excellent service for over 10 years.  Thank you so much for recommending us and for this amazing 5-Star Review.  Have a great day :)

review.comment:
My husband and I have been doing business with West Tech Mobile for over 16 years.  Our experience has always been first-rate. Bill and his team have exceptional quailty service.  Thanks for helping out with needed repairs and keeping our trucks in top notch performance.
Dean Howery Sand & Gravel Ltd.
review.review_reply: We love helping to keep trucks in top-notch performance!  Thank you so much for your years of loyalty and for this great review!  Have a good day, Ruth!

review.comment: West Tech Mobile has been looking after our fleet of vehicles since 2010.  They mean what they say and say what they mean.  Their honesty is only matched by their quality of service......excellent.
review.review_reply: Hey, Mark!  Thank you so much for this great review!  We are so happy to hear how satisfied you have been with our service over the years.  Have a good day!
Thank you for your great review, Terry!

review.comment: Great shop...the only guys we use for our fleet. Honest and affordable and will always go the extra mile.
review.review_reply: We absolutely love helping people out with fleet and going the extra mile!  Thank you for your great 5-Star Review, Tony!

review.comment:
We've used them for at least 15 years. Fast, honest and knowledgeable service.

Would recommend to anyone.
review.review_reply: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to provide CVIP inspections and regular maintenance services for your company, John!  Also, thank you for this 5-Star review.

review.comment: West Tech has been doing work on our Spray Foam Trucks for almost a year. We have had a great experience Bill and his crew. His evaluation of our trucks keep our team safe and his maintenance scheduling that he set up for us is preventing downtime and saving money.
review.review_reply: We care greatly about our customers and are glad you appreciate our maintenance scheduling.  We're always trying to find better ways to save you time and money.  Thanks for your great review, Kevin!
